name: DISCONTINUED Light TweetDeck 2.1 Night
description: I am officially discontinuing all my TweetDeck themes, so they may be outdated, but feel free to fork them (they now are into the public domain)! This style needs to be used with the dark theme of TweetDeck, otherwise it will be ugly ! This is a version of Light TweetDeck 2 made for the dark theme of TweetDeck.
